title: THE NEW YORK PRIMARY; The Vote for Mayor and Comptroller, District by District

body: LEAD: Real estate professionals often do not know as much as they should about ways to make home mortgages, and therefore homes, more affordable. To try to educate salesmen, brokers, lawyers, bankers and appraisers in the nuances and intricacies of home loans for moderate-income families, the Brooklyn Board of Realtors will hold a conference
title: POSTINGS: Educating the Pros; Mortgage Conference

body: LEAD: A businessman who admitted participating in a $100 million gasoline tax-evasion scheme and having ties to mobsters was shot to death as he drove his Rolls-Royce in Brooklyn early yesterday, the police said. A businessman who admitted participating in a $100 million gasoline tax-evasion scheme and having ties to mobsters was shot to death as
title: Mob-Linked Businessman Killed in Brooklyn

body: LEAD: Carolyn Anne Trepel, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Jerome Trepel of Belle Harbor, Queens, and Robert Fain, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Sigmund Fain of Brooklyn, were married yesterday at Temple Sholom of Mill Basin in Brooklyn. Rabbi Avner German performed the ceremony. Mrs. Fain, a special-education teacher at Public School 279 in Brooklyn,
title: Carolyn Trepel Marries
